H0.text: What German battleship was sunk in December 1943 during the Battle of the North Cape, by HMS Duke of York and her escorts. BISMARCK

H1.text: What German battleship was sunk in December 1943 during the Battle of the North Cape, by HMS Duke of York and her escorts. TIRPITZ

H2.text: What German battleship was sunk in December 1943 during the Battle of the North Cape, by HMS Duke of York and her escorts. GNEISENAU

H3.text: What German battleship was sunk in December 1943 during the Battle of the North Cape, by HMS Duke of York and her escorts. SCHARNHORST

A4.text: The German battleship Scharnhorst was sunk by HMS Duke of York and her escorts during the Battle of the North Cape.
